class bhp_off_study.models.BaseOffStudy(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_registration.models.base_registered_subject_model.BaseRegisteredSubjectModel

Base model for the Off Study model in an app.

Parameters:
  • registered_subject_id (OneToOneField) – Registered subject
  • offstudy_date (DateField) – Off-study date
  • reason (CharField) – Please code the primary reason participant taken off-study
  • reason_other (OtherCharField) – ...if “other”, specify
  • comment (TextField) – Comments:
check_off_study_date(subject_identifier, off_study_date, exception_cls=None)¶

Checks that off study date is on or after the visit model visit_datetime.

post_save_clear_future_appointments()¶

Deletes appointments created after the off-study datetime if the appointment has no visit report.
